SEARCH
Package br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers

Class BaseIndent

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers.BaseIndent
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaIndent, JspIndent, TagIndent
public abstract class BaseIndent extends Object
Class that defines the basic implementation of the indentation rules.
Since:
1.0.0
